attributes.action: Nigel Farage and UKIP chosen to negotiate terms with the EU after the referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The Government has chosen to support the Remain in the EU and therefore cannot be trusted to negotiate our future relationship with their friends in the EU.

It is imperative that competent non pro EU negotiators work on negotiations that are open, transparent and subsequently approved by the British people.
attributes.background:
We want to ensure the optimum trading terms for Britain are negotiated by competent negotiators who are without a pro EU bias.

The persons selected can be of any political persuasion (cross party) but must be verified as non EU supporter.

rejection.details: We're not sure whether your petition is asking for Nigel Farage and other UKIP members to lead the negotiations (as in the title of the petition), or for the negotiations to be carried out by a cross-party group (as in the text of the petition).
